name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your perspective, Haoyu. Unfurnished apartments typically offer more flexibility and can sometimes result in a lower rental price. What was your initial budget for a place like this?

content: I'm open to negotiations, Haoyu. How about this: if you are willing to sign a two-year lease, I can reduce the rent to 825 Euros per month.
